metadata.title: CVE-2022-45582 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
Open Redirect vulnerability in Horizon Web Dashboard 19.4.0 thru 20.1.4 viathe success_url parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45582` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 4:23.3.0-0ubuntu1
openstack-dashboard-common - 4:23.3.0-0ubuntu1
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 4:23.3.0-0ubuntu1
python3-django-horizon - 4:23.3.0-0ubuntu1
python3-django-openstack-auth - 4:23.3.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: horizon package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:23.3.0-0ubuntu1').
